title: Do Things That Make You Normal
description:
Ryan talks about the importance of cultivating humility.

For a one day only, the ebook edition of Ego Is The Enemy by Ryan Holiday is only $1.99! We have no idea how long the discount will last, so grab your copy now! Or if you prefer hardcover, you can get those over in the Daily Stoic store, where you can also get signed copies!

Sign up for the Daily Stoic email: http://DailyStoic.com/email

Follow us: Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, TikTok, and Facebook
